scripts.bundle-release-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/app.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.assemble-release-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/app.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.assemble-debug-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/app.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
